name: Prompt Receiver
author: AWENK AUDICO
description: Receives a prompt and an optional file path from a UI widget via an event and passes it to the next node.

output_schema.name: data.prompt
output_schema.description: The text prompt received from the sender widget.

output_schema.name: data.file_path
output_schema.description: The full local path to the file sent from the sender widget.
